about_the_game:
RAVEN

STORY

Raven is a renowned and respected doctor, committed to his profession despite his young age. He has cured many patients and pushed the boundaries of science and medicine. However, one day, he is unable to save someone he holds dear—his wife—who succumbs to a fatal illness. Despite using all his medical knowledge and experience, he loses her. This failure devastates him, not only as a doctor but as a person. The absence of his wife becomes an ever-expanding void, and the pain of this loss begins to consume his mind.

As days and weeks pass, reality begins to blur for him. No matter how hard he tries, he cannot accept the loss of his wife. Day and night, under the suffocating shadow of grief, he searches for a way out. He has tried every possible solution to ease his pain: meditation, therapy, medication... but nothing fills the growing dark void inside him. All that remains is hopelessness.

One day, an old friend offers Raven an extraordinary suggestion. The friend shares a story about a mysterious figure who claims to be able to bring the dead back to life. Raven knows this claim is likely pure fantasy, but his overwhelming grief has driven him to the edge. Turning to this dark path that science would never accept has become his last hope.

His friend tells him the name of this person, and that he lives in a remote village deep in the forest, in an isolated house. Despite thinking it’s absurd, Raven feels an inexplicable pull toward this dark path. His deep yearning for his wife drives him to defy reason and take the forbidden road. He surrenders himself to this last chance, filled with a mix of desperation and hope, and sets out on his journey.

As he drives through fog-covered forest roads at dusk, Raven's mind is filled with questions. Is he doing the right thing? What if this person is just a charlatan? What if they are telling the truth? The further the road stretches, the darker it becomes, and the fear and hope inside him become tangled. As he heads toward the isolated, eerie house in the forest, Raven’s fate is uncertain. Will he reunite with his wife, or will he find himself trapped in an even greater nightmare?

With his eyes fixed on the road ahead, Raven realizes he is about to make one of the hardest decisions of his life. Now, far from the cold light of science, he is stepping into a journey on the edge of darkness and the unknown.

ATMOSPHERE

The game takes you through various eerie locations, from an old house to a desolate cemetery ruled by silence and mystery. With every step, you'll physically feel alone, but the presence of darkness and the unknown will ensure you never truly feel isolated. Every corner, every sound, will leave you with the unsettling sensation that something is watching you in this world.

“Do not be deceived by the silence…”

You might think you're alone on this journey, but something’s shadow will always be at your back. With every step, every creak, every whisper, you will feel the cold breath of the unknown. In this dark world, where science's boundaries no longer apply, every choice you make will reshape your fate. Gather your courage, because there is no turning back.

The darkness calls you... are you ready to answer?

GAMEPLAY

Raven is a first-person adventure game that immerses players in a tension-filled story. Throughout the gameplay, you'll face mysteries to solve, chilling environments to explore, and psychological challenges that will test your resilience.

Exploration and Story Progression: Players explore various locations, from an old house to the deep forest and cemetery, gradually unraveling the story.

Puzzles: To progress, you’ll need to solve difficult puzzles. These puzzles require interacting with your surroundings and using your intellect. Each puzzle gradually reveals more of the story's secrets.

Psychological Tension: Even when you are alone, sounds, sudden visual changes, and the constant feeling of the unknown will keep you on edge. Players must maintain both courage and focus throughout.

Atmospheric Horror: Dark corridors, mysterious whispers, and shadows at the edge of your vision provide an experience that pushes the boundaries of fear. Environmental sounds and music escalate the tension to its peak.

NOTE: Raven is not just a game; it’s an experience that immerses the player in a deep story and intense atmosphere. As you step into the darkness, remember that every decision you make will have consequences. The responsibility for everything lies with the player.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes self-harm, blood visuals, dismemberment, animal cruelty, and underwear-level nudity.

short_description: Kuzgun, a young and accomplished doctor, falls into deep grief and despair after failing to save his wife from a terminal illness. Filled with both hope and fear, Kuzgun embarks on a journey to the edge of the unknown in this first-person thriller game.
